ygData.subject: 5th level fighter and thief
ygData.msgSnippet: okay i got a hafling thief in... well i cant think of the name that the city is,but its the 1 that hafling start out at. his name is fippo and frankly i cant
ygData.messageBody:
okay i got a hafling thief in... well i cant
think of the name that the city is,but its the 1 that
hafling start out at. his name is fippo and frankly i
cant do anything with him. also i have a 5th level
fighter in freeport that i also have trouble doing
anythin with. i played so long today trying to get them
leveled up my eyes hurt. anyways my question is this.
does anyone know if there;s any tricks to level these
guys up quick or to get some money. i pretty much
broke and cant afford anything.any ways thats it. later
